entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
